title: Bolivia’s economic crisis fuels distrust in government amid debates over ‘failed’ coup
description:
Signs reading “I’m buying dollars” line the doors of Víctor Vargas’s shoe shop in the heart of Bolivia’s biggest city, a desperate attempt to keep his family business alive.

Just a few years ago, Mr. Vargas, 45, would unlock the doors at 8 a.m. to a crush of customers already waiting to buy tennis ...
